verbs.description: [ARG0: Pres . Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: he has tapped Alabama Special Deputy Attorney General Corey Maze to serve as a District Judge on the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Alabama] .

Pres . Donald Trump announced Thursday he [V: has] tapped Alabama Special Deputy Attorney General Corey Maze to serve as a District Judge on the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Alabama .

Pres . Donald Trump announced Thursday [ARG0: he] has [V: tapped] [ARG1: Alabama Special Deputy Attorney General Corey Maze] [ARG2: to serve as a District Judge on the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Alabama] .

Pres . Donald Trump announced Thursday he has tapped [ARG0: Alabama Special Deputy Attorney General Corey Maze] to [V: serve] [ARG1: as a District Judge on the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Alabama] .
